definitions.definition: To draw air into the lungs , through the nose or mouth by action of the diaphragm .

To draw air or any form of gas (either in a pure form, or mixed with small particles in form of aerosols / smoke -sometimes stemming from a medicament ) into the lungs , through the nose or mouth by action of the diaphragm .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To draw air into the lungs , through the nose or mouth by action of the diaphragm .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To draw air or any form of gas (either in a pure form, or mixed with small particles in form of aerosols / smoke -sometimes stemming from a medicament ) into the lungs , through the nose or mouth by action of the diaphragm .
( transitive , figuratively ) To eat very quickly .
